title: No Rune Page Purchase Option
body: NA Server, Rune pages don't show up for me.

replies.body: I can't find it either!  I'll do some digging around to see what's going on.  Thanks for the heads up on this!

Update!  If you're unable to see Rune Pages, make sure to open the drop down menu and select Show All instead of Tier 3.  Tier 3 is selected by default and may not show the rune pages.  Hope that helps!
holy crap, fixed. that probably causes more confusion for people than its worth tbh. saving 2 item spots in the store vs people frantically searching forums for the fix. :p

Should also say that pre 30, they are there by default.  I think once you hit 30 the store defaults to Tier3, maybe? Which is what hides them. Its a silly mistake and im ashamed i couldnt find the fix before you. But its easily fixed, and probably deserves a change so people dont go nuts :p.
I can not find rune pages in the store. Please fix.
Oh man!  Thanks for the heads up, I'll look into this!
It looks to be back now, but you may need to reload the store.  Let me know if you're still having issues seeing it!
Yea that was it for me. I wish that could be changed but now that i'm aware of it thank you.
I still can't find the option in either alpha client or or the regular client. I even restarted my comp and my client it doesn't seem to work. Help.
yup, i can't find rune pages to buy either... this is a pain.
